meanings.definition: A bag carried by a handle or strap, used for carrying personal items.
meanings.sent1: She always carries her handbags with her wherever she goes.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new handbag to match my outfit for the party.
meanings.sent3: The handbags were chatting quietly in the corner of the store.
meanings.sent4: Her handbags were like loyal companions, always by her side.
meanings.sent5: The colorful handbags on display caught the attention of the shoppers.

meanings.sent1: She handbags the situation with ease, calming everyone down.
meanings.sent2: He handbags the tools in the workshop with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The magician handbags the cards effortlessly, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent4: She handbags her opponents in the game, always staying one step ahead.
meanings.sent5: The chef handbags the ingredients expertly, creating a delicious dish.
